verses.verse: Then he brought me forth <WH3318> into <WH413> the utter <WH2435> court, <WH2691> the way <WH1870> toward <WH1870> the north: <WH6828> and he brought <WH935> me into <WH413> the chamber <WH3957> that <WH834> was over against <WH5048> the separate place, <WH1508> and which <WH834> was before <WH5048> the building <WH1146> toward <WH413> the north. <WH6828>
Before <WH413> <WH6440> the length <WH753> of a hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520> was the north <WH6828> door, <WH6607> and the breadth <WH7341> was fifty <WH2572> cubits. <WH520>

Over against <WH5048> the twenty <WH6242> cubits which <WH834> were for the inner <WH6442> court, <WH2691> and, over against <WH5048> the pavement <WH7531> which <WH834> was for the utter <WH2435> court, <WH2691> was gallery <WH862> against <WH413> <WH6440> gallery <WH862> in three <WH7992> stories.

And before <WH6440> the chambers <WH3957> was a walk <WH4109> of ten <WH6235> cubits <WH520> breadth <WH7341> inward, <WH6442> a way <WH1870> of one <WH259> cubit; <WH520> and their doors <WH6607> toward the north. <WH6828>

Now the upper <WH5945> chambers <WH3957> were shorter: <WH7114> for <WH3588> the galleries <WH862> were higher <WH3201> than these, <WH4480> <WH2007> than the lower, <WH4480> <WH8481> and than the middlemost <WH4480> <WH8484> of the building. <WH1146>

For <WH3588> they <WH2007> were in three <WH8027> stories, but had not <WH369> pillars <WH5982> as the pillars <WH5982> of the courts: <WH2691> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> the building was straitened <WH680> more than the lowest <WH4480> <WH8481> and the middlemost <WH8484> from the ground. <WH4480> <WH776>

And the wall <WH1447> that <WH834> was without <WH2351> over against <WH5980> the chambers, <WH3957> toward <WH1870> the utter <WH2435> court <WH2691> on <WH413> the forepart <WH6440> of the chambers, <WH3957> the length <WH753> thereof was fifty <WH2572> cubits. <WH520>

For <WH3588> the length <WH753> of the chambers <WH3957> that <WH834> were in the utter <WH2435> court <WH2691> was fifty <WH2572> cubits: <WH520> and, lo, <WH2009> before <WH5921> <WH6440> the temple <WH1964> were a hundred <WH3967> cubits. <WH520>

And from under <WH4480> <WH8478> these <WH428> chambers <WH3957> was the entry <WH3996> on the east side, <WH4480> <WH6921> as one goeth <WH935> into them <WH2007> from the utter court. <WH2691> <WH2435>

The chambers <WH3957> were in the thickness <WH7341> of the wall <WH1444> of the court <WH2691> toward <WH1870> the east, <WH6921> over against <WH413> <WH6440> the separate place, <WH1508> and over against <WH413> <WH6440> the building. <WH1146>

And the way <WH1870> before <WH6440> them was like the appearance <WH4758> of the chambers <WH3957> which <WH834> were toward <WH1870> the north, <WH6828> as long <WH753> as they, and as <WH3651> broad <WH7341> as they: and all <WH3605> their goings out <WH4161> were both according to their fashions, <WH4941> and according to their doors. <WH6607>

And according to the doors <WH6607> of the chambers <WH3957> that <WH834> were toward <WH1870> the south <WH1864> was a door <WH6607> in the head <WH7218> of the way, <WH1870> even the way <WH1870> directly <WH1903> before <WH6440> the wall <WH1448> toward <WH1870> the east, <WH6921> as one entereth <WH935> into them.

Then said <WH559> he unto <WH413> me, The north <WH6828> chambers <WH3957> and the south <WH1864> chambers, <WH3957> which <WH834> are before <WH413> <WH6440> the separate place, <WH1508> they <WH2007> be holy <WH6944> chambers, <WH3957> where <WH834> <WH8033> the priests <WH3548> that <WH834> approach <WH7138> unto the LORD <WH3068> shall eat <WH398> the most holy things: <WH6944> <WH6944> there <WH8033> shall they lay <WH5117> the most holy things, <WH6944> <WH6944> and the meat offering, <WH4503> and the sin offering, <WH2403> and the trespass offering; <WH817> for <WH3588> the place <WH4725> is holy. <WH6918>

When the priests <WH3548> enter <WH935> therein, then shall they not <WH3808> go out <WH3318> of the holy <WH4480> <WH6944> place into <WH413> the utter <WH2435> court, <WH2691> but there <WH8033> they shall lay <WH5117> their garments <WH899> wherein <WH834> they minister; <WH8334> for <WH3588> they <WH2007> are holy; <WH6944> and shall put on <WH3847> other <WH312> garments, <WH899> and shall approach <WH7126> to <WH413> those things which <WH834> are for the people. <WH5971>

Now when he had made an end <WH3615> of <WH853> measuring <WH4060> the inner <WH6442> house, <WH1004> he brought me forth <WH3318> toward <WH1870> the gate <WH8179> whose <WH834> prospect <WH6440> is toward <WH1870> the east, <WH6921> and measured <WH4058> it round about. <WH5439> <WH5439>

He measured <WH4058> the east <WH6921> side <WH7307> with the measuring <WH4060> reed, <WH7070> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> reeds, <WH7070> with the measuring <WH4060> reed <WH7070> round about. <WH5439>
He measured <WH4058> the north <WH6828> side, <WH7307> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> reeds, <WH7070> with the measuring <WH4060> reed <WH7070> round about. <WH5439>
He measured <WH4058> <WH853> the south <WH1864> side, <WH7307> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> reeds, <WH7070> with the measuring <WH4060> reed. <WH7070>
He turned about <WH5437> to <WH413> the west <WH3220> side, <WH7307> and measured <WH4058> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> reeds <WH7070> with the measuring <WH4060> reed. <WH7070>

He measured <WH4058> it by the four <WH702> sides: <WH7307> it had a wall <WH2346> round about, <WH5439> <WH5439> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> reeds long, <WH753> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> broad, <WH7341> to make a separation <WH914> between <WH996> the sanctuary <WH6944> and the profane place. <WH2455>
